pullRequest.title: Dynamic Model tests to AggregationDataStoreIntegrationTest
pullRequest.bodyText:
Moved common testcases for Dynamic Model Config from Spring & standalone
License

nodes.bodyText:
We can move the filter test cases to Aggregation store IT test. But I think there may be some merit in running DynamicConfigTest.jsonApiGetTest() in Spring separately. It will help us in testing and making sure that any changes to bean configurations do not break Spring Applications.
@aklish Thoughts?

commit.message:
Revert "moved testcases"

This reverts commit d912a99ad7b9c5a06059097e6831795535b0cd99.
Merge branch 'elide-5.x-dynamic-model-it' of github.com:yahoo/elide into elide-5.x-dynamic-model-it
